title: Breath of Winter
contents: text | All creatures within a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d8 cold damage, half as much on a successful save.
text | A creature killed by this effect becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

title: Clench of the North Wind
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | The target of this effect must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed. A creature affected by this may make a Wisdom saving throw each turn to end this effect early.

title: Elemental Attunement
contents: text | You can use your action to briefly control elemental forces nearby, causing one of the following effects:
text | Create a harmless sensory effect related to air, earth, fire, or water;
text | Light or snuff a candle, torch, or small campfire;
text | Chill or warm up to 1 pound of nonliving material for 1 hour; or
text | Cause earth, fire, water, or mist that can fit within a 1-foot cube to shape itself into a crude form for 1 minute.

title: Eternal Mountain Defense
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | For the duration, you have resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

title: Fangs of the Fire Snake
contents: text | When you use the Attack action and spend 1 ki point, you cause tendrils of flame to appear from your hands and feet, increasing your reach by 10 feet for that action, as well as the rest of the turn. A hit while under this effect deals fire damage instead of bludgeoning, and you can spend 1 extra ki point when the attack hits to deal an extra 1d10 fire damage.

title: Fist of Four Thunders
contents: text | All creatures within a 15-foot cube centered on you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed back 10 feet away from you, on a successful save, it takes half damage and isn't pushed.

title: Fist of Unbroken Air
contents: text | As an action, you can choose a creature that is within 30 feet of you to make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, that creature takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage, plus an additional 1d10 for each extra ki point spent on the attack, and you can push the creature up to 20 feet away from you and knock it prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage, cannot be pushed, and does not fall prone.

title: Flames of the Phoenix
contents: text | All creatures within a 20-foot radius of a point you designate within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d6 fire damage, or half as much with a successful save.

title: Gong of the Summit
contents: text | Each creature within a 10-foot radius spread centered on a point you choose within range must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d8 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful save. Creatures made of inorganic material have disadvantage on the saving throw.

title: Mist Stance
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You transform into a mist cloud for the duration. While in this form, you have resistance to nonmagical damage and have advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. You can pass through small holes and openings, though liquids are treated as solid barriers. You cannot attack or cast spells while in this form.

title: Ride the Wind
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You gain a fly speed of 60 feet for the duration.

title: River of Hungry Flame
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You create a wall of fire up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or in a ring up to 20 feet in diameter. Each creature within the wall's area must make a Dexterity save or take 5d8 fire damage, halved on success. One side of the wall (your choice) deals 5d8 fire damage to creatures who come within 10 feet of it or end their turn within 10 feet of it.

title: Rush of the Gale Spirits
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A line of wind 60 feet long by 10 feet wide blasts away from you. Creatures in the area must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed back 15 feet. Creatures attempting to move through the wind must spend 2 feet for each 1 foot of movement. You can change the direction the wind blasts away from you as a bonus action on your turn.

title: Shape the Flowing River
contents: text | Choose an area of water no larger than 30 feet on a side within 120 feet of you. You can change water into ice and vice versa within that area. You can shape the water or ice into any shape you wish, but not larger than the area's largest dimension. You cannot shape the ice to injure or trap a creature in the area.

title: Sweeping Cinder Strike
contents: text | Each creature in a 15-foot cone starting at you must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature that fails takes 2d6 fire damage, those that succeed take half as much. This fire ignites flammable unattended objects in range as well.

title: Water Whip
contents: text | As a bonus action, you can spend 2 ki points to create a tendril of water that attacks a creature within 30 feet of you. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage (plus 1d10 for each additional ki point used) and is either knocked prone or pulled up to 25 feet closer to you. On a successful save it takes half damage and is not knocked prone or pulled.

title: Wave of Rolling Earth
contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A wall of stone 6 inches thick and up to 10 ten-by-ten foot panels connected to one another. A creature being trapped by the wall can make a Dexterity saving throw to use its reaction to move up to its speed to escape enclosure. The wall becomes permanent if you maintain concentration for the entire duration, otherwise it disappears when the spell ends.
